name: eRKSToCK's Tetris
description:
Features:
  • Local Highscores
  • 3 Difficulties
  • Controller and Keyboard support (When the game says press start, it actually means press Z)
  • 13 different ripped songs
  • Soft-lock
  • 3 block preview
  • T-spins!
Score system Move Points For every placed block: 1 x Difficulty* x Level* When you clear 1-4 lines
  • Combo += lines² x Difficulty x 3 x Level
  • Score += Combo
  • (Combo resets any time you place a block and dont clear a line)
